name: a fever dream
description:
"how many chickens are in the living room?"

faithful recreation of a dream i had on 3rd June 2022. look around the house, count animals, and answer correctly! (or not. i can't tell you what to do. )

  • 9 unique endings, inclusive of the True End of my dream!
    • 1 slightly different ending between downloadable versus browser version!
  • (some) original art(?)work that totally didn't take less than 10 minutes! includes a very cute frog drawing, somewhere!
  • a sense of humor which doesn't make sense to anyone (im sorry)
  • lots of animals
  • extremely fun and not at all rage-inducing math puzzles
  • 100% free use 3d assets and sounds
    • except one(1) original jingle by yours truly
  • you have a wife
  • "what did i just play" vibes
